incidents.title: Internal Server Error when using Passliss
incidents.content:
When connecting to passliss.leocorporation.dev, a 500 Internal Server Error is displayed, causing the website to not work properly.

2023-10-07T16:16:32.672Z
Workaround

Please use passliss.leocorporation.dev/home instead of the root domain to connect to the website.

incidents.title: DNS change
incidents.content:
We are making some changes in our DNS configuration. Some of our subdomains may not be available.

2023-03-22T13:32:33.091Z
Resolved

We have successfully removed one of our DNS record pointing to a development URL.

incidents.title: DNS Modification
incidents.content:
We are updating our DNS Configuration, which will make our blog unaccessible for some time. We are rolling out a new update for our blog.

2022-08-24T08:24:25.635Z
Resolved

Our DNS Configuration has been updated. You should see our new blog.

Learn more
